addEventListener

public void addEventListener(StorageManager.StorageEventListener listener)

writeToFile

private void writeToFile()
Serialize data and write it to the file

save

public void save()
Attempt to save the data. First check if there's update, if yes, writeToFile();

Deserialize all data from the json file and start the timer that will attempt to save for each interval
